channel.title: Bryan Hayes
channel.description: Recent news about Bryan Hayes, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by news.com
item.description:
Northen NDP MP's in Sault Ste. Marie - Wawa
"People in the Sault are frustrated. Their local Conservative MP Bryan Hayes has been MIA since he was elected. Whether it's the issue of pension, health care or the economy Mr. Hayes just doesn't seem to have the gumption to stand up and be counted."

item.title: Mentioned by LOCAL2 Sault Ste. Marie
item.description:
NDP MP's Meet in the Sault : It's Time to Put North Back On Political Map
"People in the Sault are frustrated. Their local Conservative MP Bryan Hayes has been MIA since he was elected. Whether it's the issue of pension, health care or the economy Mr. Hayes just doesn't seem to have the gumption to stand up and be counted."

item.title: Mentioned by SooToday.com
item.description:

United Steelworkers representatives and friends will gather outside the Queen Street East office of Sault MP Bryan Hayes between noon and 12:30 on August 7. According to a USW news release, those present will gather "to denounce the abuses resulting ...

item.title: Mentioned by Sault This Week
item.description:
Highway 17 east of Sault to be improved
MP Bryan Hayes announced today, Thursday, that the stretch of roadway starts one kilometre east of the junction of highways 17 and 548 and continues eastward toward Bruce Mines. "Our government is proud to invest in these improvements that will create ...
